Sentencas: For La0.8Sr0.2MnO3 (LSM) perovskite, used as the cathode material for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC), it is known that the formation of a triple-phase-boundary is restrained due to the formation of a second phase at the YSZ/electrode interface at high temperature.
Titulo: Molten salt synthesis of La0.8Sr0.2MnO3 powders for SOFC cathode electrode

Sentencas: To decrease the 2(nd) phase, lowering the sintering temperature has been used.
Titulo: Molten salt synthesis of La0.8Sr0.2MnO3 powders for SOFC cathode electrode

Sentencas: LSM powder was synthesized by molten salt synthesis method to control its particle size, shape, and agglomeration.
Titulo: Molten salt synthesis of La0.8Sr0.2MnO3 powders for SOFC cathode electrode

Sentencas: We have characterized the phase formation, particle size, shape, and sintering behavior of LSM in the synthesis using the variation of KCl, LiCl, KF and its mixed salts as raw materials.
Titulo: Molten salt synthesis of La0.8Sr0.2MnO3 powders for SOFC cathode electrode

Sentencas: In the case of KCl and KCl-KF salts, the particle size and shape of the LSM was well controlled and synthesized.
Titulo: Molten salt synthesis of La0.8Sr0.2MnO3 powders for SOFC cathode electrode

Sentencas: However, in the case of LiCl and KCl-LiCl salts, LiMnOx as 2(nd) phase and LSM were synthesized simultaneously.
Titulo: Molten salt synthesis of La0.8Sr0.2MnO3 powders for SOFC cathode electrode

Sentencas: In the case of the mixed salt of KCl-KF, the growth mechanism of the LSM particle was changed from 'diffusion-controlled' to 'reaction-controlled' according to the amount of mixed salt.
Titulo: Molten salt synthesis of La0.8Sr0.2MnO3 powders for SOFC cathode electrode

Sentencas: The sintering temperature can be decreased below 1000 A degrees C by using the synthesized LSM powder.
Titulo: Molten salt synthesis of La0.8Sr0.2MnO3 powders for SOFC cathode electrode
